current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To modernize the conservation title of the Food Security
		  Act of 1985, protect long-term taxpayer investment, increase small and midsize
		  farmer’s access to programs, and prioritize modern-day conservation needs
		  through management practices, local engagement, and
		  stewardship.
